The user Local Panel added this with a false premise, claiming that Italian Fascists claimed that fascism didn't need to be right-wing when the quote says it is right-wing but is disinterested in its political position. The full quote is needed.
NPOV. Mussolini said it wasn't necessary for fascism to be considerd on the right.
The first paragraph was too short, merged the first two paragraphs. They both discussed the basic elements of fascism in a concise manner.
